name: Outer Worlds: Murder on Eridanos
description: In Murder on Eridanos, the hero is hired to investigate the murder of prolific Aetherwave Actress Ruth Bellamy, otherwise known as Halcyon Helen. This brand new storyline takes place on Eridanos, home to the Rizzo's line of beverage distilleries and their famed Purpleberry Orchards. Embark on a journey of intrigue and mystery as you solve the case of Halcyon Helen.
